comment: Thanks for reading this. Paths are Roads isn't actually a mod, so this update.json is purely for fun. Also the changelogs won't fully reflect what's on CurseForge, Modrinth, or Github, as I don't repeat the features that are new to 2.1.0 here if that was the first version available for a Minecraft version.

1.18.2.2.2.0:
Added: Naturalist support
Added: Snow Pig support
Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.19.2.2.2.0:
Added: Naturalist support
Added: Snow Pig support
Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.19.4.2.2.0: Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.20.1.1.0.1:
Added: Hellion's Sniffer+ support
Added: Duplicated block tag to item tags to allow for paths to be found in recipe viewers
Fixed: Aether's Flying Cow not being affected
1.20.1.2.0.0:
Added: Added path_user/{source} tags to allow for path_users to be found in recipe viewers
Added: Tags that place conditions on the entities to speed up
Changed: Tags refactored and split, counts_as_path -> paths, path_user -> unconditional_user
Changed: Performance improvements
Fixed: Alex's Mobs's Laviathan not being affected
1.20.1.2.0.2: Fixed: path_user lookup for Simple Kelpies
1.20.1.2.1.0:
Added: path_markers tag (default: tripwire), can be placed to give a boost to any block as long as it's in the three blocks underneath the block you're standing on
Added: Undergarden Paths support
Added: Macaw's Paths and Pavings support
Api: added bool_tamed entity type tag for Tamed entity nbt
1.20.1.2.2.0:
Added: Naturalist support
Added: Snow Pig support
Added: Roost Re-hatched support
Added: Ravage & Cabbage support
Added: RideableRavagers support
Added: RideablePolarBears support
Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.20.4.2.2.0: Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.20.6.2.2.0:
Added: Snow Pig support
Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt

1.21.1.2.2.0:
Added: Snow Pig support
Api: added bool_issaddled entity type tag for IsSaddled entity nbt
